subject: Reinstatement of provision of Earnest Money Deposit (EMD) in bids for highway projects - reg.
text: Idly <74f4 XTTHNf qfearrut 744 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 9T (sc @Rar- a {TorArf #1T4) W47 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v-5 & 6, #aer-10, ERqT , T ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Bid Security/2022 Policy Circular No. 3.1.33 dated 28th February, 2022 [Decision taken on e-office file No. NHAI/CMD/PSGBG/2020(Computer No: 46547)] Sub: Reinstatement of   provision of Earnest Money Deposit   (EMD) in bids for highway projects reg: MoRTH vide OM No_ NH-35014/20/2020-H-(Part-II) (E-1 96330) dated 22.02.2022 (circulated vide NHAI policy no. 3.1.32 dated 25.02.2022) on the above subject has conveyed the decision of Competent Authority to revert to the provisions of GFR, 2017 in the bid documents, which existed before issue of Department of Expenditure Office Memorandum No. 9/4/2020-PPD dated 12.11.2020 regarding bid security. 2 Now, MoRTH vide OM No. NH-35014/20/2020-H-(Part-II) (E-1 96330) dated 28.02.2022 has clarified that notwithstanding the provisions contained in the MoRTH letter dated 07.10.2019, vide which clause 2.20 of the model RFP f EPC project was modified to make provision for signing of Bid securing declaration form" only by the bidder , the latest instructions contained in the MoRTH OM dated 22.02.2022 are applicable to all modes, including EPC. A copy of same is attached for compliance and necessary action: 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above 2g102/ 2022 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi: 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site_ 3 Web Admin for circulation.
